title: 智利鋼琴大師電影巨星山狗一直關注家鄉

replies.msg:
I accept the claims for a better Chile, but in a peaceful way and without destroying the goods we all need. That way we hurt ourselves.
Those who suffer most with this are children who do not understand what things happen because of us adults.
We must be more united than ever for a better Chile 🙏🏽 I call for agreements and solutions. All for a better chili and for the children who are not to blame for anything, they are the present and the future of our Chile 🙏🏽😢❤

quote.msg:
I accept the claims for a better Chile, but in a peaceful way and without destroying the goods we all need. That way we hurt ourselves.
Those who suffer most with this are children who do not understand what things happen because of us adults.
We must be more united than ever for a better Chile 🙏🏽 I call for agreements and solutions. All for a better chili and for the children who are not to blame for anything, they are the present and the future of our Chile 🙏🏽😢❤
